tier.item: (i) `No student has talked to Juuna yet.'
(ii) `One student hasn't talked to Juuna yet.'
(3) a. Suli atuartu-p ataatsi-p Juuna uqaluqatigi-sima-nngi-la-a-
(i) `No student has talked to Juuna yet.'
(ii) `One student hasn't talked to Juuna yet.'
No student has talked to Juuna yet.
One student hasn't talked to Juuna yet.

`I bought the quilt that Mary made.'

b. thep khii-pa the nee yin (Tibetan)
`The book that Peem carried is mine.'

kandow nyan g t-go n yu
[just fire [granary] burn.PST.3sg]-the in millet much was
